Species: Iberian Lynx (Lynx paradinus)

EUNIS Home > Kingdom: Animalia > Phylum: Chardata > Class: Mammalia > Order: Carnivaro > Family: Felidae > Genus: Lynx > Species: Lynx pardinus > See subspecies
Next Previous

More images

Quick Facts

First named 1824 as "Felis pardina" by Temminck

It has 5 scientific synonyms and 22 common names

Protected in 94 sites in Europe.

Mentioned in 5 legal instruments.

Lives in 3 habitat types.

How is this species doing?

International threat status

World

Unknown

Europe

Vulnerable

IUCN (2009)

Species is mentioned by the following legal instruments

Detailed reference Legal text Comments Url
CITES Appendix I valid from 24 June 2010 CITES Appendix I Synonym for this species is listed in CITES. See there for more details. http://www.cites.org/eng/app/appendices.shtml  
Council Directive 92/43/EEC of 21 May 1992 on the conservation of natural habitats and of wild fauna and flora - Annex II EC Fauna, Flora, Habitats Directive http://eur-lex.europa.eu/LexUriServ/LexUriServ.do?...
